location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Views on Quetta-Nushki-Siestan [Sistan] Trade Route: No. 11. Dalbandin Thana'

mods.abstract: The photograph shows Dalbanin Thana, a large fortified post with walls and several towers. The fort is situated in an arid landscape. In front of the walls are several figures, all of which appear to be men. Some are standing, others sitting by the walls.The photograph was probably taken by H A Armstrong, Assistant Superintendent, Indian Telegraph Department.
